mapper.select: SELECT ai.content_id, ai.title, COUNT(ah.content_id) AS hit_count FROM attraction_info ai JOIN attraction_hit ah ON ai.content_id = ah.content_id GROUP BY ai.content_id, ai.title ORDER BY hit_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DATE(join_date) AS registration_date, COUNT(*) AS member_count FROM members GROUP BY DATE(join_date) ORDER BY registration_date;

SELECT s.sido_name, g.gugun_name, COUNT(ai.content_id) AS attraction_count FROM attraction_info ai JOIN gugun g ON ai.gugun_code = g.gugun_code JOIN sido s ON g.sido_code = s.sido_code GROUP BY s.sido_name, g.gugun_name ORDER BY s.sido_name, g.gugun_name;
SELECT HOUR(register_time) AS time_slot, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM board GROUP BY HOUR(register_time) ORDER BY time_slot;
